answers.author: Louise Snyder
answers.text:
Hi Jason-Could you provide some more detail regarding the service for which you'd like to conduct the assessment? ICMA offers a number tools for assessing operational and service-delivery performance. With some more information, I'm sure we can find some useful resources for you.

author: Jason Rainer
text: Do you have any information concerning having an operational assessment done or who can perform one?
title: Operational Assessments
